title: Self-supervised contrastive learning for MR image reconstruction of cardiac CINE on accelerated cohorts
details: S Xu, M Früh, K Hammernik, S Gatidis, T Küstner
abstract: Synopsis Keywords: Image Reconstruction, Machine Learning/Artificial Intelligence, Self-Supervised Learning, Image Reconstruction, HeartExisting methods for deep- learning reconstruction require abundant fully-sampled images as labels, which is …
